summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Turkish PDF generation and bank account features. All backend APIs (8/8 tests passed) and frontend functionality working correctly. Turkish character support implemented with DejaVuSans font, professional PDF layout with company info, bank accounts CRUD, and logo upload all functional.
passed_tests: Bank Accounts CRUD API (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE)
Logo Upload API with base64 storage
PDF Template Settings API with Turkish characters
PDF Generation with Turkish characters (İ, ş, ğ, ü, ö, ç)
Settings Page - Three tabs (Firma & PDF, Banka Hesapları, Sipariş Türleri)
Bank Account Management UI with Turkish character support
Company Info Management with Turkish fields
PDF Download button on Order Detail page
Professional PDF layout with company info, product table, totals
Turkish customer names and product names in PDF
Extended PDF template fields (tax info, website, validity_days, payment_terms, delivery_terms)
